posts.title: Spring 2020 Sanity Check
posts.post: I'm taking CS 374, CS 241, CS 242, and CS 126 next semester. I also plan to work 20hrs/wk. Is this courseload too much?

comments_list.text: ...You're joking, right? I've never seen a more crazy courseload in my life
do you have an ability to do HW while at work??

posts.title: Should I take CS 411 or CS 465 for my tech elec?
posts.post: Need to fulfill my tech electives but I'm not quite sure which of these classes I should go for. Thoughts?

comments_list.text: UI Design is a lot different from other courses in CS, you learn a lot about how human brains work in relation to User Interfaces.
I <3 Abdu, CS 411 all the way!

posts.title: What's the easiest course you've taken?
posts.post: I got to fill 18 credit hours next semester so I want to make my life as easy as possible!

comments_list.text: STATS 100: GET KARLE, SHE IS SO KIND AND FUNNY AND RELATABLE. LOOOOTS OF EXTRA CREDIT SO ITS VERY EASY TO GET AN A IN THE CLASS
AAS 297/SOCW 297: Bruh... legit its a breeze. legit just group discussion and u get an A. It fulfills Cultural Studies and Social & Behavioral Sciences.
CLCV 115 is super easy, if you just memorize the study guide and do all the assignments you're pretty much guaranteed an A.
